name: mri_glmfit-sim
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: A tool to run corrections for multiple comparisons on volumes or surfaces, using various methods including Monte Carlo simulation, permutation, and Gaussian Random Fields.

inputs.description: Path to GLM directory.
inputs.name: GLM Directory

inputs.description: Cluster-wise p-value threshold, default is 0.05.
inputs.name: Cluster-wise p-value threshold

inputs.description: Use pre-computed z-based Monte Carlo simulations. Requires vwthreshold and sign.
inputs.name: Monte Carlo Simulations

inputs.description: Directory for custom Monte Carlo simulations, default is FREESURFER_HOME/average/mult-comp-cor.
inputs.name: Monte Carlo Simulations Directory

inputs.description: Label for custom Monte Carlo simulations, default is cortex.
inputs.name: Monte Carlo Simulations Label

inputs.description: Use permutation simulation with nsim iterations, cluster forming threshold (CFT), and sign.
inputs.name: Permutation Simulation

inputs.description: Use permutation on the residual instead of raw data for non-orthogonal designs.
inputs.name: Permutation on Residual

inputs.description: Use sign flipping instead of shuffling for permutation.
inputs.name: Permutation Sign Flipping

inputs.description: Use Gaussian Random Fields (GRF) method, with vwthreshold and sign.
inputs.name: Gaussian Random Fields

inputs.description: Apply additional Bonferroni correction across 2 spaces.
inputs.name: Correction for 2 Spaces

inputs.description: Apply additional Bonferroni correction across 3 spaces.
inputs.name: Correction for 3 Spaces

inputs.description: Delete previous CSDs.
inputs.name: Overwrite Previous CSDs

inputs.description: Divide simulation into njobs and put in background.
inputs.name: Background Jobs

inputs.description: Number of seconds to sleep between background polls.
inputs.name: Sleep Duration

inputs.description: Use aparc.a2009s instead of aparc for region of vertex max.
inputs.name: Use a2009s Annotation

inputs.description: Use specific annotation for region of vertex max.
inputs.name: Annotation

inputs.description: Specify logfile, default is csdbase.mri_glmfit-sim.log.
inputs.name: Log File

inputs.description: Override csdbase name.
inputs.name: CSDBase Name

inputs.description: Do not simulate, only run cluster.
inputs.name: No Simulation

inputs.description: Set simulation random number generator seed.
inputs.name: Simulation Seed

inputs.description: Override fwhm in glmdir.
inputs.name: FWHM Override

inputs.description: Add fwhmAdd to the estimated fwhm.
inputs.name: FWHM Add

inputs.description: Use uniform PDF instead of gaussian, specify min and max.
inputs.name: Uniform PDF

inputs.description: Do not output a cluster annotation.
inputs.name: No Output Annotation

inputs.description: Do not compute means of each subject in each cluster.
inputs.name: No Cluster Mean

inputs.description: Specify the GLM input y file.
inputs.name: GLM Input Y File

inputs.description: Report the coordinates/annotation of the centroid instead of max.
inputs.name: Centroid Reporting

inputs.description: Compute the sum over voxels in the cluster rather than the average.
inputs.name: Spatial Sum

inputs.description: Show the help message and exit.
inputs.name: Help

output-files.description: Sig volume corrected for voxel-wise multiple comparisons.
output-files.name: Corrected Sig Voxel

output-files.description: Sig volume corrected for cluster-wise multiple comparisons.
output-files.name: Corrected Sig Cluster

output-files.description: Summary of the input (y) over each cluster.
output-files.name: Y OCN Data

output-files.description: Original sig volume masked to show only clusters.
output-files.name: Masked Sig Volume
